speaker: Agent
text: Hello, this is Mark calling from XYZ Collections. How are you today?

speaker: Customer
text: I’m doing well, thank you. What’s this about?

speaker: Agent
text: I’m reaching out regarding an outstanding balance on your account. To protect your privacy, may I have your date of birth for verification?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you for that information. Can you also confirm your current address?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you for the verification. I see you have a balance of three hundred dollars. Would you like to discuss payment options?

speaker: Customer
text: I can do a payment plan. What do you suggest?

speaker: Agent
text: We can set up a plan for monthly payments of one hundred dollars for three months. Does that work for you?

speaker: Agent
text: Great! I’ll set that up for you. You’ll receive a confirmation email shortly.

speaker: Agent
text: You're welcome! If you have any questions, feel free to reach out. Have a great day!
